General.Name: Ganzhou Tengyuan Cobalt New Material Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Ganzhou Tengyuan Cobalt New Material Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sales of cobalt and copper products in China. It offers cobalt salts, such as cobalt chloride, cobalt sulfate, and electrodeposited cobalt for use in lithium battery cathode materials, alloys, magnetic materials, ceramic color glazes, electronic component materials, feed additives, electroplating, petrochemical catalysts, pharmaceutical reagents, and other fields; and electrodeposited copper for use in electronic and electrical, machinery manufacturing, national defense, building materials, civil appliances, and other fields. Ganzhou Tengyuan Cobalt New Material Co., Ltd. was founded in 2004 and is based in Ganzhou, China.
